source:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Yezahn is mumbling to himself indistinctly.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
パーラカの里のイェザーンは、悩んでいるようだ。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_01<tab>You catch the attention of a distracted man who introduces himself as Yezahn, and he quickly recognizes you as the one who saved Mehvan and Qerasaf's daughter. He informs you that her recovery is proceeding apace, but worries about where she will go after fully healed. The alchemist has taken it upon himself to find a potential parent, and enlists your aid in questioning the people of Palaka's Stand to see if any have room for one more in their heart.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

イェザーンと話した。彼は、自分以外に赤ん坊の親代わりになれる住民がいるか、情報を集めたいようだ。サベネア島のパーラカの里で、住民に聞き込みをしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken to the locals and gathered a variety of opinions on the matter of the child's future caregiver. Yezahn is doubtless eager to hear what you have learned.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_02<tab>住民に聞き込みをした。パーラカの里の「イェザーン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_03<tab>While quick to dismiss himself as a potential candidate, Yezahn gives a moment's consideration upon the mention of Pasareen. Although he seems hesitant to ask her to take on such an enormous responsibility, he admits she is the best option at present. He resolves to at least speak with her, asking you to be a reassuring presence by his side.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_03<tab>イェザーンに報告した。パーラカの里の「パサリーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_04<tab>You find Pasareen doting over her own child, and she greets Yezahn with a smile. The smile soon vanishes, however, after Yezahn makes his request. She gives a vague denial, but Yezahn does not press further. He takes his leave of Pasareen, asking you to meet him at his workshop to discuss this development further.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_04<tab>パサリーンと話した。パーラカの里の「イェザーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_05<tab>Yezahn seems troubled by Pasareen's words and decides that he cannot stand idly by while his friend is in distress. In the meantime, he will also ponder the question of who will raise the child. He asks that you help him once more, both for the child's sake and the sake of a distraught mother.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_SEQ_05<tab>イェザーンと話した。彼は、パサリーンの物言いが気になっているようだ。彼女や赤ん坊を気にかけるイェザーンに、もう少し協力してあげよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_000<tab>Ah... Oh, excuse me. Did you need something?

TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_001<tab>Wait, you're <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>! The very <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who saved Mehvan's child. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_001<tab>あれ、もしかしてお前さん、
メヴァンたちの赤ん坊を救った<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>かい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_002<tab>I knew it. I'm Yezahn, an alchemist of the Great Work. I am but one of the few who are looking after the child as she makes her recovery.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_002<tab>やっぱりか。
俺はイェザーン、遺烈郷の錬金術師だ。
ほかの連中と協力して、赤ん坊の手当をしている。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_003<tab>Mehvan and Qerasaf were dear friends of mine. Thank you for everything you've done for their daughter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_003<tab>あの子の両親……
ケラシャフとメヴァンは、幼馴染でよ。
あいつらの子を救ってくれて、感謝してる。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_005<tab>Her condition is on the mend, I'm sure you'll be glad to hear. We've been taking turns checking in on her─the last thing she needs is a gaggle of adults fussing over her day and night.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_005<tab>あの子の具合もよくなってきたから、
休憩がてら、外に出てきたところでよ。
ちっと、考え事もあってなぁ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_006<tab>That being said, when she is healed fully, there is the question of who will be in charge of her care. For the love I bore her parents, I would gladly take her in as my own, but that would mean raising her away from her home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_006<tab>……あの子、順当にいけばここで育てられるんだろうけど、
俺が引き取って、遺烈郷で育てようかって考えてんの。
他でもない、幼馴染夫婦の子どもを放っておけなくてよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_007<tab>Moreover, I am yet to be wed, and my duties consume so much of my time I can scarce focus on my own care, let alone that of a growing child. I doubt my ability to give her the love she deserves─love equal to that her parents gave her.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_007<tab>ただ、俺は結婚もしていないし、
研究一筋で、自分の面倒すら適当に済ませてきた男だ。
親代わりが務まるのか、我ながら疑問なんだわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_008<tab>She deserves better than that, so I've considered finding someone more suitable. It's the least I can do, and truth be told, perhaps the best option.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_008<tab>俺が意固地になって、赤ん坊を振り回すのは本意じゃないし、
他に適任がいるなら任せる、って選択も考えてはいる。
なもんで、お前さんに頼みたいことがあってね……

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_009<tab>Even so, although I was born here, much of my life was spent at the Great Work. I'm afraid I haven't the foggiest idea who to ask, even if I had the time to do so.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_009<tab>親代わりの適任者が他にいるか、情報を集めてほしいんよ。
出身はここだが、遺烈郷での暮らしが長いもんだから、
最近の事情には疎いんだわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_010<tab>You, however, seem to be well loved among the people here. Could you ask around in my stead? It would be a much more effective use of my time to prepare medicine for the wounded and sick.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_010<tab>直接聞くと、俺に気を遣って答えるヤツもいそうだし？
急ぎで調合しないといけない薬もあるから、
お前さんに頼めると助かる。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_011<tab>I apologize for imposing such an enormous task upon you, but I would trust no one else with it. When you've finished, come to my hut to the south of this settlement and we can discuss any potential parental candidates.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_011<tab>急な頼みなのに、あんがとよ。
パーラカの里の南にある家屋で作業してるから、
里の連中から話を聞けたら、教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_012<tab>Let me know what the people say─we'll find a suitable parent yet.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_012<tab>里の連中から話を聞けたら、教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_000_015<tab>Who do <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> think is most suited to care for the child? Yezahn is the obvious choice. Dependable, loyal, and dutiful. Every quality you would desire in a parent.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_000_015<tab>イェザーン以外で、赤ん坊の親代わりになれそうな人？
思い当たらないというか、適任は彼だろう。
約束は守るし、義理堅い男だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_000_016<tab>I know he does become so absorbed in his research, but that devotion has made him a peerless alchemist. Who better is there to look after someone so sickly as her?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_000_016<tab>少々、研究に傾倒しすぎるきらいはあるけどね……。
そのぶん、錬金術師としての腕に間違いはない。
病を患いやすい赤ん坊には、必要な人材だよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_000_017<tab>If you ask me, Pasareen is the most motherly among us. She had a child of her own not too long ago, so I reckon there's no one better to be a wet nurse.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_000_017<tab>赤ん坊の親代わりねぇ……
ああ、パサリーンならどうかしら？
彼女も子どもが生まれたばかりで、乳母になれると思うの。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_000_018<tab>That being said, times have been troubled for us all. It might be unseemly to ask her to take on such a burden unless she was willing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_000_018<tab>ただねぇ……彼女、いろいろあったみたい。
ひとり育てるだけでも大変だし、引き受けるかはわからないわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_000_019<tab>The child, eh? None dote over her quite like Yezahn, but I understand alchemy isn't a merciful trade for a parent. Still, there's no one else that comes to mind when I consider the question.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_000_019<tab>ケラシャフとメヴァンの子のことか。
イェザーンは信用に足るが、仕事が忙しいだろうし、
本来なら里で育てるのが筋だが、他の候補……思いつかんな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_000_020<tab>I'd volunteer to take her in myself, but with the chaos of recent events it's difficult enough to see that me and mine are fed and clothed. I know I'm not the only one facing such hardships, either.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_000_020<tab>なんなら、私も名乗り出たい気持ちはある。
だが、先の混乱で身内も落ち着かない状況だから難しい。
きっと、似たような住民が大半だろうな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_100_020<tab>Yezahn would be a loving and responsible father, I'm sure.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSA04493_100_020<tab>イェザーンになら、赤ん坊も任せられるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_100_021<tab>Pasareen is a loving mother, but one child is handful enough...
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSB04493_100_021<tab>パサリーン、大丈夫かしらね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_100_022<tab>Apologies that I couldn't be of more use.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_RESIDENTSC04493_100_022<tab>お役に立てなくて、すまない。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_025<tab>Welcome to my humble workshop, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm almost too nervous to ask, but what did the others say?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_025<tab>おつかれさん。
めぼしい情報は聞けたか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_026<tab>Eh? Someone nominated <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? Well, that's neither here nor there. You said Pasareen's name was mentioned?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_026<tab>へえ？
俺って意外と評判いいじゃないの、なんて話はさておき……

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_027<tab>She was a good friend to Mehvan, it's true, but there are other factors at play that make me reticent to ask her.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_027<tab>パサリーン、ね。
メヴァンとも親しかったし、納得の人選だわ。
ただ、お前さんの聞いた話によると、ワケありらしいな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_028<tab>Simply put, I'd rather not burden her further if it can be avoided. That being said, we don't exactly have the luxury of choice, all things considered.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_028<tab>そういうヤツは、なるべく避けたいんだがねぇ。
ま、何の事情も抱えてないヤツなんか、
今の里にいるはずもない、か。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_029<tab>I suppose I would be remiss if I didn't at least speak with her. I owe the child that much. Will you accompany me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? A supportive presence by my side would help me find the right words.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_029<tab>込み入った話をすんのは苦手だが、
赤ん坊のためなら、嫌がってもいられないよな。
よかったら、お前さんも同行してもらえると心強いよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_030<tab>Pasareen should be nearby, doubtless watching over her own child. I must deliver this medicine before speaking with her, so please go on ahead.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_030<tab>赤ん坊を抱えている女性がいたら、そいつが「パサリーン」だ。
俺は先に、調合した薬を依頼人に届けてくるから、
お前さんは彼女に声をかけておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_031<tab>Yezahn, it's so good to see you. And who is this with you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_031<tab>あら、イェザーン。
もしかして、こちらの方はあなたのお知り合い？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_032<tab>Pasareen, meet <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. <var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> the hero who saved Mehvan and Qerasaf's daughter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>だ。
ケラシャフとメヴァンの子を、救ってくれた。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_033<tab>Oh, what a pleasant surprise! Thank you for your bravery.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_033<tab>そう、あなたが……
メヴァンの子を守ってくれて、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_034<tab>I've heard tell of the troubles she's been through since. I hope that you're able to see her returned to health soon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_034<tab>彼女のことは、聞いているわ。
一緒に育児をがんばろうって、話していたのに……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_035<tab>It has been trying, to be sure, but we must look forward to the day she is hale. Everyone is doing their utmost to make it so.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_035<tab>本当に悔やまれる……。
けど、悲しんでばかりってわけにもいかない。
俺たち大人は、あいつらの子のことを考えてやらないと。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_036<tab>The question remains as to where she will go from there, however. I've considered taking her into my home, but I fear my qualifications as a parent are somewhat lacking.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_036<tab>俺は、あの子を引き取ろうと思ってるんだが、
立派な親代わりになれる自信があるかっていうと、そうじゃない。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_037<tab>I know you to have been a dear friend to Mehvan, and as such only thought it meet to ask if you're willing to care for her daughter. If you are, I would do everything in my power to see that she is given into your care.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_037<tab>お前さんは、メヴァンと仲が良かったし、
引き取りたいって希望があるか、確認しておきたくてよ。
もちろん、そうするなら、俺も全力で協力するが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_038<tab>I...I'm flattered. Mehvan was as family to me, and I view her child as my own. I would do anything to see her raised into as brave a woman as her mother...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_038<tab>あの子は、私にとって家族も同然。
できるかぎりのことは、してあげたいけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_039<tab>...However, I cannot care for her. I'm not worthy to care for her.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_PASAREEN_000_039<tab>でも、ごめんなさい。
私には、彼女の子を育てる資格がないわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_041<tab>Ah, my apologies. I understand it was a sudden request, and no small one besides. Please forgive the imposition.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_041<tab>あー、いや……そうか……。
急なこと聞いて悪かったな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_042<tab>I'll be in the village for some time yet. Should you require treatment for you and yours, please seek me out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_042<tab>俺、しばらく里にいるし、
体調の不安とかあれば、遠慮なく言ってくれや。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_044<tab>I would speak with you further, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let's return to my dwelling.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_044<tab>なあ、もうちっといいか？
さっきの場所で、落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_050<tab>I wasn't too forceful, was I? I simply asked her if she was willing...I didn't mean to make her feel obligated to agree.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_050<tab>お前なんぞに任せられっか、とは言われなかったし、
赤ん坊を引き取るのはいいとして、だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_051<tab>I found her words somewhat mystifying. “Not worthy”? What could that mean? I'm usually not one to pry, but this worries me. I consider Pasareen a friend, and I am loath to leave her to her troubles.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_051<tab>パサリーンの「資格がない」って言葉が、どうにもひっかかる。
深入りするのは性分じゃないが、放ってもおけない。
彼女は、幼馴染の親しい友人なんでね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_052<tab>And there is still the matter of the child. Hmm... I shall have to think on what to do from here. I may need your help again soon, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope you are willing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF101_04493_YEZAHN_000_052<tab>これで結構、俺って友人想いなわけよ。
まあ、何をするにしても、俺には赤ん坊のこともあるし、
もう少し、お前さんに手を貸してもらえると、助かるわ。
